idea-plugin.name: Corner Mascot
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin displays a small mascot image at the bottom-right corner of the IntelliJ window. Users can also customize the mascot by choosing any local image file through the settings panel.

How to Change the Mascot Image

  1. Open Settings / Preferences in IntelliJ.
  2. Navigate to Tools â†’ Corner Mascot.
  3. Click the Browse button.
  4. Select any PNG/JPG image from your local machine.
  5. Press Apply or OK to save.

The plugin will automatically use the selected image. If no custom image is selected, the default mascot will be shown.
